sentences.en: " All right,'said Drouet, creaking off in his good shoes toward the elevator.
sentences.cn: “ 好的, ” 杜洛埃说, 穿着双高级皮鞋.嘎吱嘎吱地朝电梯走去.

sentences.en: An elevator mechanic can work the machinery directly by turning this lever.
sentences.cn: 电梯修理工可以转动这根杠杆直接操作机器。

sentences.en: Burke pushed the button and the elevator began its slow ascent.
sentences.cn: 伯克按动电钮;电梯开始缓慢上升.

sentences.en: He still could not throw any further light on why the elevator could have become jammed.
sentences.cn: 对于电梯为什么会卡住他仍旧给不出更多的解释。

sentences.en: It boasted the largest grain elevator in the world.
sentences.cn: 它自称有世界上最大的谷仓.

sentences.en: It's on the fifth floor, so we'd better take the elevator.
sentences.cn: 那是在六楼上，我们最好乘电梯。

sentences.en: Kelly eased off his pace as they reached the elevator.
sentences.cn: 当他们走到电梯前时，凯利放慢了步子。

sentences.en: The elevator broke down and we had to walk up the tenth floor.
sentences.cn: 电梯坏了,我们只好走到十层.

sentences.en: The elevator creaked to a halt at the ground floor.
sentences.cn: 电梯嘎吱一声停在了一层。

sentences.en: The elevator descended slowly to the ground floor.
The elevator doesn't stop at floors 1, 2 and 3.
sentences.cn: 电梯在一 、 二、三楼不停.

sentences.en: The elevator is not operating properly.
The rope broke, and the elevator plunged down to the ground.
sentences.cn: 缆绳断了, 电梯猛然掉到地面上.

sentences.en: We’ll have to take the elevator.
With an elevator in the skyscraper , we can easily go up and down.
sentences.cn: 摩天楼里有电梯, 上下很方便.

words.tran_cn: 提高的；高尚的；严肃的；欢欣的
提高；抬起；振奋；提拔（elevate的过去分词）
提升；举起；振奋情绪等；提升…的职位

phrases.tran_cn: 斗式提升机；斗式运输机
n. 电梯门厅，电梯前廊
[美俚]电梯音乐（电梯里单调的轻音乐）
液压升降机；液压卷杨机；水力提升机
（美）员工或送货人使用的电梯；服务电梯

trans.tran_en: a machine that takes people and goods from one level to another in a building
